name: Robert Marchetti
bio: Executive Vice President of Restaurants & Bars. Host of the @therawhospitalityshow @veronika_nyc @veronikarestaurant.berlin @fotografiska

social_posts.post_text: Entrusting someone to lead this magical restaurant our team has created, is not easy. It’s a nightly ballet on a tight rope, with demanding hours, tenacity, kindness and patience. We couldn’t think of a better leader, and most importantly, a great human, to lead a very talented dining room and team. @hans_luttmann @veronika_nyc

Berlin with pleasure. An honor to have you aboard Roel, an amazing talent, classically trained, and a true gentleman to join our incredible hospitality team. More news to come on this. @fotografiska @fotografiska.berlin

Thank-you to my incredible global team on yet another successful restaurant launch. To all those who helped create this magical place, we thank-you. Every venue we open, we leave a little piece of our identity in. To all the hard working players in this restaurant, we are very grateful. Lastly to you @ivano4ka for being my rock ❤️

I finally finished this. 
Acrylic on stretched canvas. 
Wedding gift. @julesfrank & @mralperin 
“The Pool Bombers”
Happy Mothers Day in the big sky. An incredible woman and mother. A post world war child that always saw the good in people and the planet. We will always miss and love you.

To achieve their vision, the NeueHouse team has settled on coastal Italian as both an aesthetic and cuisine. “It’s a very communal style of eating, which just fits with the way creatives want to hang out and not sit down in a very stuffy, fine dining, white tablecloth-type environment,” says Goss. Robert Marchetti, who heads bar and restaurants globally for NeueHouse, says he imagined Reunion as “the never-ending summer holiday of our dreams.”

Happy Fathers Day. Although it’s been a while since you’ve been here, we have no doubt you are still on your way to heaven after a few stops for lunch. A true gentleman, also responsible for my bad jokes. Love you Dad.
Building our next adventure. What a privilege to be part of this legacy building. More to come. @fotografiska.berlin @fotografiska
Thanks for the great pic @sergio_marchetz my parents & sister rocking the 70s.

Only when you think you’re done is when you realize you haven’t even scratched the surface. What a privilege and honor to collaborate with one the worlds best and most creative magic makers. Damn we had fun creating Bar Veronika and Chapel Bars drinks program. @mralperin @veronika_nyc @chapelbarnyc @fotografiska.newyork @fotografiska
Master Baker & Chefs. Good things to come. An incredible vegan bakery. Collaboration times, are when a genius streak is created. @freabakery @freaberlin @fotografiska.berlin
Super proud of you @camillo.bernabei @fedez on launching @drinkboem the hard seltzer for hard men like me 🤣
The year was 2022 when I added my new and old recipes to our menu @veronika_nyc
‘retrospettiva in bianco e nero’  #photo credit @ivano4ka
Happy 15th birthday Amore. Momma gave you her youthful genes for sure. 🐾🎉🎉🎉🎉🎉🎉🐾
Seriously, a wonderful kitchen team. Such amazing talent. Very humbled. @fotografiska.berlin @fotografiska
Years in the making, @yoram_roth vision is open. Our new Bakery to start. What an amazing team. @fotografiska.berlin @fotografiska
We are opening soon. Taking reservations now. Tap the link in bio. @veronikarestaurant.berlin @fotografiska.berlin @fotografiska

Can’t tell you how proud I am of this incredible team Veronika, Berlin. They have worked tirelessly to get to our opening next week. @veronikarestaurant.berlin @fotografiska.berlin @fotografiska @yoram_roth
What a wonderful first review of our new restaurant in Berlin. @veronikarestaurant.berlin @berliner_zeitung
Executive Vice President of Restaurants & Bars. Host of the @therawhospitalityshow @veronika_nyc @veronikarestaurant.berlin @fotografiska
